metadata.title: CVE-2023-52708 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  mmc: mmc_spi: fix error handling in mmc_spi_probe()  If mmc_add_host() fails, it doesn't need to call mmc_remove_host(), or it will cause null-ptr-deref, because of deleting a not added device in mmc_remove_host().  To fix this, goto label 'fail_glue_init', if mmc_add_host() fails, and change the label 'fail_add_host' to 'fail_gpiod_request'.
